articles.description: Warns viewers of stereotypes, negative depictions of cultures in certain episodes
articles.content:
(Newser)
Disney Plus began streaming the Muppet Show on Friday, and modern viewers will see something original viewers didn't decades ago—a disclaimer warning viewers about insensitive cultural cont… [+1360 chars]

articles.author: Sana Farzeen
articles.title: Rakhi Sawant on walking out of Bigg Boss 14 finale with Rs 14 lakh: I have zero bank balance, need money for mother’s surgery - The Indian Express
articles.description: Rakhi Sawant, who entered Bigg Boss 14 as a challenger, spoke about her roller-coaster journey on the show, the focus on her marriage and how the show has evolved from season 1.
articles.content: Rakhi Sawant is happy and satisfied with the way her journey on Bigg Boss 14 culminated. The Pardesiya girl was probably the only contestant this season to have taken an effort to entertain the audie… [+4358 chars]
